subject: Medicine and Health
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bobby Murcer didn’t expect to be writing his autobiography so soon. “Yankee for Life: My 40-Year Journey in Pinstripes” will be released on his 62nd birthday.
snippet: Bobby Murcer didn’t expect to be writing his autobiography so soon. “Yankee for Life: My 40-Year Journey in Pinstripes” will be released on his 62nd birthday.
